Translations.Text: Prout Abraham levabat foundations shrine unus cum Ismail (they prayed Noster Dominus accept hoc ex nos! Vos est Hearer Omniscient)
Noster Dominus factus nos submitters to Vos ex noster descendants let ibi est community submitters Vos! Teach nos ritus noster religionis redeem nos! Vos est Redeemer Merciful
Noster Dominus levabat among them messenger recite them Tuus revelations teach them scripture wisdom purify them! Vos est Almighty Wise
Qui forsake religionis Abraham 1 qui fools his suus anima? Nos chosen eum in hoc saeculum in Hereafter he est cum the righteous
When his Dominus dictus to eum Submit he dictus ego submit Dominus universe
Alias Abraham exhorted his infans perfecit same ac ita perfecit Jacob O my infans DEUS pointed religionis vos non abiit submitters

Habet vos testis Jacob his decessus thorus; he dictus to his infans Quod testimentum vos worship post ego abiit? They dictus Nos worship tuus deus; deus de tuus patris Abraham Ismail Isaac; 1 deus! To Eum nos est submitters
Such est community preter. They est responsible quod they earned vos est responsible quod vos earned Vos non est answerable anything they perfecit
